website_summaries.verdict: This gloomy yet sweet donkey makes the perfect baby gift, and with its extra-sturdy stitching and easy-to-clean polyester material, Eeyore was made to last.
pros: Designed after the visual style of the original book’s illustrations
Made for kids of all ages
cons: A little on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Not really what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love Tigger, this was a bit of a disappointment. The legs look way too small for his body and his stripes are painted on. I expected better from something that not only says Disney but also baby. I wouldn't let this near my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepers

customer_reviews.title: What is this crap?
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived looking like a cheap knockoff. very disappointed. This would have been the ninth Eeyore in my collection but its going back. Also sizable chunk of fur missing on nose. Also this is barely 9 inches like the description says. Title is wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Al R.

customer_reviews.title: PAINTED STRIPES
customer_reviews.text: This was inexpensive and oh so cute looking online. Bought to add to a baby gift. the orange is nice and plush, but his stripes are GREY PAINT! no idea if the paint is ok for a baby to be sucking on, cause thats what babies do!!! This is more a decorative item that sits in a chair or on a shelf. would return, but it was $8. i guess the seller wins, but seriously. painted stripes??? How cheap can Disney get?
customer_reviews.author: ingrid

customer_reviews.title: donkey
customer_reviews.text: This donkey is great. It's the best donkey. There are not other donkeys better than this donkey. This country will have good donkeys. #makedonkeysgreatagain
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Really? Cheaply painted stripes?
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the envelope to find the Tigger's tail sticking out looking crusty I thought I'd received a defective plush. However, after removing all the plastic I realized that it was just poorly made. All the brown stripes are painted on and look crusty/cheap. It's the most bizarre plush for a baby I've ever seen. I had higher hopes as this was supposed to be a gift included in a Winnie-the-pooh baby shower basket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WHAT CAN YOU SAY MORE THAN ‘PIGLET RULES’
customer_reviews.text: I just finished writing a review for the Pooh Bear version of this nostalgic form of ‘The hundred acre wood gang’. This is such a sweet stuffed animal with Disney quality and the perfect gift for all who love the timeless stories about Winnie Pooh and best friend Piglet. I was in charge of Security for Disneyland while going through an internship; and even the crazy thousands of things and dilemmas couldn’t help me from hugging the Piglet Character while at work. Beautiful for any baby/toddler- 57 year old dude like me.
customer_reviews.author: Major T.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Not very soft and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Soft. Not very cute. Got it for my puppy because she keeps stealing the grand kids stuffed tiger toys. Since its baby safe I figured it would be safe for puppy. She just doesn't love it as much as the other tigers. Would not buy this for a baby. It's not very cuddly or lovable.
customer_reviews.author: Janet B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Replaced quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I got mine today. And it came with a huge hole in the leg. As it is very cute. I will be returning and replacing it because it was perfect minus the whole in its leg.. I really loved it otherwise. I love everything pooh. And this was so soft and plushy. I also got their tigger but I wasnt a fan. It felt crusty and gross. I was pretty disappointed In it. And I got the piglet. The piglet is all around absolutely perfect. I wish they came out with owl kanga roo and rabbit. Edit: I replaced it. No more hole and I absolutely LOVE it
customer_reviews.author: Kryna

customer_reviews.title: Walt would be embarrassed this Tigger has Disney on it's label
customer_reviews.text: I bought all 4 characters and the other stuffed animals were very cute but the Tigger is terrible. Visible glue all over it's back, which I suppose is what's meant to hold the flaking stripes on? I wouldn't let this near a child, in fact I wouldn't let it near my dog. Huge disappointment in this poorly made toy, do not bother with this mess.....
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. The stripes are painted on right over the fur and not even in the right places! I would never give this to a baby seemed toxic somehow. The sewing is terrible also. Should be in a bin at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: ecs

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Soft Eeyore!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Eeyore to decorate the table at my daughter's first birthday party (classic Pooh theme). He is the perfect size, very soft and seems to be very well-made. I think she will enjoy snuggling with him for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen

customer_reviews.title: Painted Stripes
customer_reviews.text: Although the Tigger was the right size his stripes were clearly painted on. I had read the reviews prior to ordering so I know there was a 50% chance it would not be the product described. I will be returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly classic Tigger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at a baby shower then gifted it to the guest of honor to use in her nursery. He was perfect! So soft and just exactly classic Tigger!
customer_reviews.author: W. Parris

customer_reviews.title: Not well made, unrecognizable as Tigger
customer_reviews.text: Almost unrecognizable as Tigger. The legs are attached seperately with a flat seam and no stuffing. It looks and is cheap. I don’t recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Winona Murray

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but sheds just a little
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved the stuffed eeyore and he is adorable. It sheds just a little not much but it is worth mentioning for parents wanting to give a young baby the stuffy. Worth the money for my son's first birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 yr old niece for Christmas and it’s her favorite stuffed animal now! It is exactly as pictured and very soft. Will buy again if she loses or destroys the current one lol
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute and soft. I got it for my mom for her birthday since she loves Eeyore so much!
customer_reviews.author: SapphireeIris

customer_reviews.title: So cute and perfect for any child
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest Eeyore stuffed animal and so safe for any age child. Not to mention how cute it is.. lol I bought one for myself because of the cuteness and feel of it. Any child will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Howell

customer_reviews.title: Not machine washable
customer_reviews.text: Amazon product description says it’s machine washable but the tag on the toy says not to immerse in water.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Tigger
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect addition to my baby shower gift for my sister in law. My nephew is sure to love this cuddly Tigger. I was really pleased with the fast shipping and great quality of Tigger. Would shop from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Jean

customer_reviews.title: Adorable piglet, right size, soft, fluffy and made well
customer_reviews.text: Bought for first baby. Very cute. Vintage looking. Pink piglet with light green shirt. Fluffy, soft material. Just the right size. Its great for us.
customer_reviews.author: Tiggerbell

customer_reviews.title: EEyore minus the classic eeyore tail
customer_reviews.text: The one enduring thing about eeyore was his tail, well this is missing the bow and button. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: ESSIE

customer_reviews.title: It's Eeyore. What else can be said?
customer_reviews.text: Great gift idea for toddler. My cousin lives this for her daughter. It got snuggled right away.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hanscom

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: "Piglet" was just as described and super soft. Added to the top of a Baby Gift.... Fast Shipping ~ Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: NBrown

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: So so cute! This is one of the first things I bought for my daughter who will be born in December. I love the classic Winnie the Pooh characters and Eeyore was my favorite growing up. It is very soft and a great size.
customer_reviews.author: N H

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo cute and extraordinarily soft. Small but not tiny. Purchased this for a new baby in the family, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lp

customer_reviews.title: So cute.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the original illustrated version, the scale and sewn features. Perfect for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plush and giftable
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to my sister and she loved it. Eeyore was super plush and would be a great gift to give anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena C.

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift, super soft!
customer_reviews.text: Gave my mother as a birthday gift. She loves it and it's so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love Eeyore, I mean he is representative of a Jungian archetype for me. And, for me, I love the 'classic' Eeyore look vs. the Disney version just/this much more.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to complete my nephews nursery and it completes the set fine, matched perfectly with the rest for the crew!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Tyree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for the baby shower then the babies room

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price

customer_reviews.title: Loveable
customer_reviews.text: I bought Piglet and Tigger for my sister's baby shower and everyone loved them!

customer_reviews.text: Kind of ugly but once again My granddaughter loved it Small

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: So so so so soft, my daughter loves this plush.

customer_reviews.text: So adorable! I used them for a baby shower then gave them to the mama to use in her nursery! Perfect classic Eeyore

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift

customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a grown woman who was under the weather. She absolutely loved it! So cute and soft/cuddly

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and soft just a warning though the 2 front legs are attached to each other still love him though

customer_reviews.title: Authentic, rustic

customer_reviews.title: Cute Ti-g errrr

customer_reviews.title: 👍

customer_reviews.title: The stripes feel painted off
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt really soft. The brown feels like its painted on to the fur. Also. Doesnt much look like tigger. To skinny.

customer_reviews.title: Classic Pooh Characters are the Finest!
customer_reviews.text: The classic Pooh collection characters take you back to your childhood days and the classic adventures of Pooh. I love them so much more than the new Disney characters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Eeyore!
customer_reviews.text: We had this on our baby registry and when we got it, it was the perfect decoration for our baby's room! It is so soft, and doesn't have buttons or anything incase the baby does want to play with it. Such a wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Watched the movie Christopher Robin with my 40 year old daughter. She has always loved Eeyore, so I ordered this for Christmas. Looked just like the "old" Eeyore in the movie. So soft! She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cuddle buddy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love him!! I plan on getting the rest of the Winnie the Pooh gang too. Very soft but smaller than I thought. No complaints though! He’s perfect cuddle size. His legs are sewn together but I don’t mind at all.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Selvage

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute Classic Pooh rendition of Piglet! It’s so soft and the perfect size for a baby nursery. I know little one will love it when she arrives

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend and it's perfect. It's very soft and has the perfect amount of stuffing so he's not stiff or too flimsy. I am highly satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Shay

customer_reviews.title: I didn't even bother keeping it.
customer_reviews.text: The stripes are spray painted on and mats down the fur. Looks and feels terrible. I threw it away.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Very soft pelt. Toddler plays with it a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Tigggger
customer_reviews.text: I love this little tiger. They sell it for $25 in the gift shop where I work. I was happy to get it on amazon for less than $15

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable and very soft! Perfect for my sons Classic Pooh themed room.

customer_reviews.text: Super cute and soft. Just wish it was a little bigger but still perfect size.

customer_reviews.title: Soft classic cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Piglet is so soft and cuddly. I have Pooh, Eeyore, Piglet and the Christopher Robin Tigger and I absolutely adore them.

customer_reviews.title: Lopsided Eeyore :(
customer_reviews.text: Eeyore's left ear is much lower on his head than the right side. His entire head looks lopsided too, but that just could be because of the ear being off. Super soft though.

customer_reviews.title: Classic hundred acre woods heirlooms!!

product_meta.title: Disney Baby Classic Eeyore Stuffed Animal Plush Toy, 9 inches
product_meta.description: Style:EeyoreKids love snuggling with this cuddly guy as parents read them a Pooh adventure or even as they watch a Pooh cartoon! Based on the classic tales of "Winnie the Pooh" by AA Milne, Eeyore stands 9" and is ultra soft as well as machine washable. His eyes are made with thread and the ribbon attached around his neck reads “My sweetest adventures always include you”
feature_bullets: EEYORE STUFFED PLUSH: Kids Preferred presents this super soft, cute, charmingly detailed stuffed animal. Babies, toddlers, and kids love this classic and collectible comfy friend.
CARING FRIEND: This plush toy is a comforting pal and perfect for get well wishes, birthdays and more! It is a huggable travel friend for kids on road trips & airplanes, or a cute bedroom decoration.
MODERN CLASSIC TOY: Disney's Winnie the Pooh, Eeyore is instantly recognizable bringing sweet memories from your own childhood as it brings joy to your children today.
COLLECTIBLE FUN: Plush animals are fun to collect and trade and make great keepsakes for children, teens & adults. Favorite stuffed toys are soothing for toddlers & make carefree pets!
DETAILS: Based on the classic tales of "Winnie the Pooh" by AA Milne, Eeyore stands 9" and is ultra soft as well as machine washable. “My sweetest adventures always include you” ribbon detail.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars529 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
